title: Machiavels ghost, as he lately appeared to his deare sons, the moderne projectors divulged for the pretended good of the kingdomes of England, Scotland, and Ireland.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publisher: Printed by J.O. for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: The tract has been ascribed to Thomas Heywood. Cf. BM.
Another ed. has title: Machiavel, as he lately appeared, etc.
"Printed by authority, in the yeare of grace, 1641"
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
